medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message by identifying the message by a message number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time on which the message is sent.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free text with prior agreement under request of recipients.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify the means of transport handled by the terminal operator.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to identify the means of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the location where the means of transport is handled.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify dates and times on which the means of transport is handled.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify relevant reference numbers for the means of transport and the operations.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to specify the details of the cranes performance based on working times and volume of cargo operation.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to specify details of the equipment, such as the equipment identification number.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the number of lifts performed for cargo operation.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to specify dates and times and other details for the operations carried out.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify a date and time related to the equipment operation.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide detailed information related to the equipment operation during the indicated date/time/period.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the number of lifts performed for cargo operation during the indicated date/time/period.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify name and address of a container operator or a terminal operator and further details of the performance provided by the terminal operator.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify name and address of a container operator or a terminal operator.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to specify the type & size of the equipment operated.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify the amount and further details of equipment operated by a terminal operator.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the amount of equipment operated by a terminal operator.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify the amount of equipment given in the preceding QTY segment.
